title: Embodiment of underweight and normal-weight avatars affects bodily self-representations in anorexia nervosa
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Luca Provenzano, Sofia Ciccarone, Giuseppina Porciello, Manuel Petrucci, Barbara Cozzani, Armando Cotugno, Ilaria Bufalari
